properties.title: Use of stripped version of junit-addons

section.name: Use of junit-addons Library
section.p:
Because of the great assertion functionality I introduced the library JUnit-Addons v1.4 into this project.
This library is provided under the Apache Software License.
To reduce the dependency graph of DDTUnit I imported the assertion classes from junit-addons v1.4 without modifications under the package junitx.framework.
